data.title: Andrew Ross on LinkedIn: Looking forward to attending my first United Soccer Coaches Convention…
data.meta_description: Looking forward to attending my first United Soccer Coaches Convention. Stop by our booth at Capelli Sport #729 to say hi, get some giveaways and learn more…
data.text:
◼️◼️◼️◼️Loudoun United FC x Capelli Sport Capelli Sport to Become the Official Uniform and Team Gear Supplier for Loudoun United Football Club Capelli Sport is proud to announce a new partnership with Loudoun United Football Club (Loudoun United or LUFC) of the United Soccer League (USL) Championship. Beginning in January 2024, this deal will make Capelli Sport the official and exclusive uniform provider for the Leesburg, Virginia–based club. Capelli Sport will also supply LUFC with training gear and apparel for coaches and select staff. CEO and Managing Partner of Attain Sports and Entertainment, Greg Baroni said: “Loudoun United FC is thrilled to announce an exciting new partnership with Capelli Sport for our team gear. As we continue to strive for excellence on the field and in our community, this collaboration with Capelli Sport aligns with our commitment to quality and innovation. Our players and fans can look forward to top-notch gear and equipment—together with Capelli Sport, we’re ready to make a bold statement both on and off the pitch.” President and CEO of Capelli Sport, George Altirs said: “We are excited to join forces with Loudoun United FC and Attain Sports & Entertainment. Under the leadership of Principal Owner Greg Baroni, Executive Business Officer Douglas Raftery, and Head Coach Ryan Martin, their organization has made a remarkable impact on Loudoun County since its founding in 2018. It is evident that Attain Sports & Entertainment is rapidly emerging as a significant presence in the metropolitan DC sports landscape, and it will be our pleasure to see LUFC take the field in Capelli Sport uniforms next season.” #CapelliSport #PlayForward

◼️◼️◼️◼️ CAPELLI SPORT x USL SPOKANE Capelli Sport to Become the Official Uniform and Equipment Supplier for all three USL Spokane teams Capelli Sport is excited to announce a new multi-year partnership with USL Spokane, through its ownership group, Aequus Sports, LLC. This agreement will make Capelli Sport the official and exclusive provider of uniforms, equipment, and training apparel for the Washington State–based organization. Capelli Sport will outfit all of USL Spokane’s professional and pre-professional players, including the USL League One men’s team, the brand-new women’s first division USL Super League and USL W-League women’s pre-professional. The partnership will officially begin in July 2023 with all three teams being outfitted and served from their 2024 inaugural season and into the next two years of play, 2025 and 2026. Founded in 2022, USL Spokane is a member of the United Soccer League; the largest and fastest-growing professional soccer organization in North America. USL Spokane will host their home games at a new stadium located in the vibrant North Bank District of downtown Spokane. The A1 location provides a premium fan experience with walkability to local bars, dining, hotels, and cultural amenities. The new stadium is a multi-use venue in partnership with Spokane Public Schools and the Spokane Public Facilities District with a Fall 2023 projected completion. Rounding out the investment in community in parallel with growing the game of soccer for Washington State, USL Spokane will be adding a Youth Academy to the club in the summer of 2025. Managing Partner of Aequus Sports, Ryan Harnetiaux said: “Amidst significant interest from top brands, Capelli Sport stood out as the best fit for our club. We’re not only impressed by their product quality and ability to execute truly customizable kits; but most importantly, the professionalism of their leadership and total commitment to both the men’s and women’s game.” Strategy Consultant & USL Spokane Leadership Team, Janette Atkins said: “We are deeply committed to equity and engagement with our team, our fans, and our community. It was crucial for us to find a partner who not only shares our values, but who can also stay agile and authentically grow alongside us. Capelli Sport represents that and much more. They clearly understand the importance of our community commitment, not only as a symbol of our home team but as a representation of our passion and beliefs.” President and CEO of Capelli Sport, George Altirs said: “We are excited to partner with USL Spokane as the United Soccer League continues to grow. It’s always as an honor to provide uniforms to the home team as they compete in their new stadium for the first time. We’ve all been truly impressed with Ryan and Katie Harnetiaux’s passion for the game, and we’re committed to helping them elevate the game of soccer in the Pacific Northwest and Canada.” #CapelliSport #CapelliSportFamily

◼️◼️◼️◼️ Santiago Castaneda x MSV Duisburg Capelli Sport is excited to announce its first athlete to complete the entire Capelli Sport Plus+ Player Pathway-Pro, Santiago “Santi” Castaneda, of Florida Premier FC. Santi was first discovered by Capelli Sport Plus+ Technical Staff at the Capelli Sport Plus+ Southeast-North Talent ID in Tampa, Florida. ➡️ In 2022, Santi was selected as one of 17 players invited to play on the Capelli Sport USA U19 All-Star Team for the third annual Capelli Sport Cup Denmark. ➡️ Following an unforgettable European experience, Castaneda was keen to take it a step further. With interest from Capelli Sport owned club, MSV Duisburg, Santi was invited and took part in the Capelli Sport Plus+ Player Pathway-Pro Trial. ➡️ With a green light from executive management, Santiago Castaneda has signed his first professional contract with German 3. Liga club, MSV Duisburg to start his career. Capelli Sport welcome’s Santiago Castaneda to the ever-growing Capelli Sport Family and best wishes for his inaugural season as a professional footballer. Capelli Sport would also like to congratulate the great work and support that Florida Premier FC have provided throughout this process and Santi’s overall development on and off the field. #capellisport #capellisportplus #capellisportplayerpathwaypro #msvduisburg #floridapremierfc
